description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter mobile application, defining the app's widget tree including the main app widget and a stateful home page with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the main screen, displaying a loading message.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building its user interface.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the Flutter application, which runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.
